Total Cost of Revenue: cost of goods and services sold

Income Before Taxes: income loss from continuing operations before investment income and income taxes

Interest Income: interest and fee income loans and leases

Depreciation and Amortization: depreciation on equipment on operating lease and other vehicle related expense and other expense
Other Operating Expenses: provision for loan lease and other losses

Weighted Average Shares Outstanding (Bas: weighted average number of shares outstanding basic
Weighted Average Shares Outstanding (Dil: weighted average number of diluted shares outstanding

Total Revenues: operating lease rental and other revenues
operating leases income statement lease revenue
revenue from contract with customer excluding assessed tax

__unmapped__: common stock dividends per share declared
income loss from continuing operations before income taxes extraordinary items noncontrolling interest
income loss from continuing operations before income taxes minority interest and income loss from equity method investments
